1{-# LANGUAGE TupleSections #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Subtree.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Subtree
7  ( -- * Pattern
8    SubtreePattern (..),
9    subtreeL,
10    subtreeB,
11    SubtreeTerm (..),
12    subtreeText, subtreeTexts,
13
14    -- * Conversion
15    Subtree,
16    SubtreeOutput,
17    SubtreeValue,
18    subtreeStringTest,
19    subtree, subtreeBy,
20    subtreeOne,
21    subtreeData,
22  ) where
23
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext                 as U
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol           as S
28
29
30-- ============================================  Pattern
31
32-- | Subtree pattern.
33data SubtreePattern
34    = SubtreeL SubtreeTerm (U.Sivmap String)                   -- ^ Leaf
35    | SubtreeB SubtreeTerm (U.Sivmap String) [SubtreePattern]  -- ^ Branch
36    | SubtreeR (U.Sivmap String) [SubtreePattern]              -- ^ Recursive branch
37      deriving (Show, Eq)
38
39-- | Create non-termification leaf pattern.
40--
41--   >>> subtreeL $ S.sivmapEq "foo"
42--   SubtreeL SubtreeNone (SivmapEq "foo")
43--
44subtreeL :: U.Sivmap String -> SubtreePattern
45subtreeL = SubtreeL SubtreeNone
46
47-- | Create non-termification branch pattern.
48subtreeB :: U.Sivmap String -> [SubtreePattern] -> SubtreePattern
49subtreeB = SubtreeB SubtreeNone
50
51-- | Termification of subtree content.
52data SubtreeTerm
53    = SubtreeNone
54    | SubtreeText [S.JudgeClass] S.TermName
55    | SubtreeSeq  [S.JudgeClass] S.TermName
56      deriving (Show, Eq)
57
58-- | Create text term.
59--
60--   >>> subtreeText "A" "/x"
61--   SubtreeText ["A"] (TermName EQ "x")
62--
63subtreeText :: (S.ToTermName n) => S.JudgeClass -> n -> SubtreeTerm
64subtreeText c = subtreeTexts [c]
65
66-- | Create text term with multiple classes.
67subtreeTexts :: (S.ToTermName n) => [S.JudgeClass] -> n -> SubtreeTerm
68subtreeTexts cs n = SubtreeText cs $ S.toTermName n
69
70
71-- ============================================  Conversion
72
73-- | Subtree.
74type Subtree a = B.RawTree [SubtreePattern] a a
75
76-- | Subtree with termified elements.
77type SubtreeOutput a = B.RawTree [SubtreePattern] (SubtreeTerm, a) (SubtreeTerm, a)
78
79-- | Subtree with value.
80type SubtreeValue = SubtreeOutput O.Value
81
82-- | Test string matches selection rule.
83--
84--   >>> subtreeStringTest (S.sivmapEq "foo") <$> ["foo", "foobar", "barfoo"]
85--   [True,False,False]
86--
87--   >>> subtreeStringTest (S.sivmapKeep "foo(*)") <$> ["foo", "foobar", "barfoo"]
88--   [True,True,False]
89--
90subtreeStringTest :: U.Sivmap String -> String -> Bool
91subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapId)        _  = True
92subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapEq s)      t  = s == t
93subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapKeep _ e)  t  =       U.sivMatchExpr e t
94subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapOmit _ e)  t  = not $ U.sivMatchExpr e t
95subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapChain f g) t  = subtreeStringTest f t && subtreeStringTest g t
96subtreeStringTest (U.SivmapAssoc _ _) _  = False
97
98-- | Select subtree.
99--
100--   >>> let tree = B.TreeB [] "Y1" [B.TreeL "Z1", B.TreeL "Z2", B.TreeB [] "Y2" [B.TreeL "Z3"]]
101--   >>> B.printTree tree
102--   > [] "Y1"
103--     - "Z1"
104--     - "Z2"
105--     > [] "Y2"
106--       - "Z3"
107--
108--   >>> B.printTrees $ subtree [subtreeB (S.sivmapEq "Y1") [subtreeL (S.sivmapEq "Z1")]] [tree]
109--   > [] (SubtreeNone,"Y1")
110--     - (SubtreeNone,"Z1")
111--
112--   >>> B.printTrees $ subtree [SubtreeR (S.sivmapId) [subtreeL (S.sivmapEq "Z3")]] [tree]
113--   > [] (SubtreeNone,"Y1")
114--     > [] (SubtreeNone,"Y2")
115--       - (SubtreeNone,"Z3")
116--
117--   >>> B.printTrees $ subtree [SubtreeR (S.sivmapId) [subtreeL (S.sivmapEq "Z1")]] [tree]
118--   > [] (SubtreeNone,"Y1")
119--     - (SubtreeNone,"Z1")
120--
121--   >>> B.printTrees $ subtree [SubtreeB (subtreeText "A" "/y") (S.sivmapId) [SubtreeL (subtreeText "A" "/z") (S.sivmapEq "Z1")]] [tree]
122--   > [] (SubtreeText ["A"] (TermName EQ "y"),"Y1")
123--     - (SubtreeText ["A"] (TermName EQ "z"),"Z1")
124--
125subtree :: [SubtreePattern] -> [Subtree String] -> [SubtreeOutput String]
126subtree = subtreeBy subtreeStringTest
127
128-- | Select subtree by element tester.
129subtreeBy :: (U.Sivmap String -> a -> Bool) -> [SubtreePattern] -> [Subtree a] -> [SubtreeOutput a]
130subtreeBy test = loop where
131    loop ps0 ts = p1 O.<++> ts where
132        p1 t = p2 t O.<?> ps0
133
134        p2 (B.TreeL z) (SubtreeL term f)
135            | test f z     = Just $ B.TreeL (term, z)
136            | otherwise    = Nothing
137        p2 (B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeB term f ps)
138            | test f y     = Just $ B.TreeB [] (term, y) (loop ps xs)
139            | otherwise    = Nothing
140        p2 (B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeR f ps)
141            | test f y     = case loop (SubtreeR f ps : ps) xs of
142                               []  -> Nothing
143                               xs' -> Just $ B.TreeB [] (SubtreeNone, y) xs'
144            | otherwise    = Nothing
145        p2 _ _ = Nothing
146
147-- | Select subtree.
148subtreeOne :: [SubtreePattern] -> O.Map [Subtree String]
149subtreeOne = subtreeOneBy subtreeStringTest
150
151subtreeOneBy :: (U.Sivmap String -> String -> Bool) -> [SubtreePattern] -> O.Map [Subtree String]
152subtreeOneBy test ps0 ts = p1 O.<++> ts where
153    p1 t = p2 t O.<?> ps0
154
155    p2 t@(B.TreeL z) (SubtreeL _ f)
156        | test f z      = Just t
157        | otherwise     = Nothing
158    p2 (B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeB _ f ps)
159        | test f y      = Just $ B.TreeB ps y xs
160        | otherwise     = Nothing
161    p2 (B.TreeB _ y xs) (SubtreeR f ps)
162        | test f y      = Just $ B.TreeB (SubtreeR f ps : ps) y xs
163        | otherwise     = Nothing
164    p2 _ _ = Nothing
165
166-- | Extract data from subtree.
167subtreeData :: SubtreeValue -> [S.RawJudge O.Value]
168subtreeData tree = gatherData O.<++> subtreeTerms tree
169
170gatherData :: [S.JudgeTerm O.Value] -> [S.RawJudge O.Value]
171gatherData = judges where
172    judges xs   = terms   O.<$$> B.gatherToAssocOrder xs
173    terms  ts   = content O.<$$> B.gatherToAssocOrder ts
174    content [c] = c
175    content cs  = O.VList cs
176
177subtreeTerms :: SubtreeValue -> [[S.JudgeTerm O.Value]]
178subtreeTerms = branch where
179    branch t@(B.TreeL _) = [leaf t]
180    branch (B.TreeB _ term xs) =
181        case B.partitionLB xs of
182          (ls, bs) -> let ts = val term ++ (leaf O.<++> ls)
183                      in if null bs
184                         then [ts]
185                         else (ts ++) <$> (branch O.<++> bs)
186
187    leaf (B.TreeL term)   = val term
188    leaf (B.TreeB _ _ _)  = []
189
190    val (SubtreeText cs n, v)  = (, (n, v)) <$> cs
191    val (SubtreeSeq  cs n, v)  = (, (n, v)) <$> cs
192    val (SubtreeNone, _)       = []
193
